title: Mountain Duet: Mystery and Romance in the Rockies
description: Grab a cup of hot cocoa and snuggle up for a duet of short stories, one a mystery and one a romance, both set in the Rocky Mountains. It's Christmas time in Colorado, but a local legend has the residents of Bonner Peak on edge, buying deadbolts and guns. Olivia is certain there's nothing to worry about, but is she willing to accept a cowboy's invitation to prove it? In Montana, Texas girl Leah is out of her element in the mountain cold, but her boyfriend couldn't be more comfortable. When a romantic Christmas tree hunt turns into an unexpected adventure for this city girl, she finds out it's family that makes a place a home.
author: Cynthia Bruner
